name: Mechaccountant
description:
It's war!

Unfortunately, we are running out of mecha pilots, so you - as an accountant at our company - have been promoted* to pilot! We have no time or pilots left to train you, so you'll hit the ground running and learn as you go.
Welcome aboard!

*You are still obligated to perform all your accountant tasks.

Main features:

  • Take direct control of a giant mecha while inside it
  • Move towards nearby cities and attack the enemy mechas
  • Order items, request attacks, and sign papers on your mecha's desk
  • Follow company orders, sign government documents, and avoid spam mail
  • Coffee

Press F11 to Fullscreen

Minimum requirements:

  • ~800 MB RAM
  • ~200 MB storage

Known Issues:

  • If you have a black screen after the intro sequence, wait a few seconds for the game to load.
  • There are some stutters during gameplay for the first time.
  • We are using an alpha build of Godot 4, so expect random crashes and visual issues.
  • The game is limited at 60 FPS.
